Author: Donstyles
Description: Replaces ground textures wirh extra mushy low resulution versions to make units and resources pop out. Includes a baked in grid, so you need to disable the in-game grid in your options. I also replaced all snow terrains with comparable ones of a temperate climate, as well as the bright green jungle grasses. Takes a lot of the strain of the eye in cluttered battles.
Title: Smooth Ground Textures with Grid NoSnow
